tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE PrintMediaFeedback (
  feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  reader_id INT,
  publication_title VARCHAR(255),
  comment TEXT,
  complaint TEXT,
  suggestion TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE ReaderComments (
    comment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    reader_id INT,
    publication_id INT,
    comment_text TEXT,
    comment_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE Complaints (
    complaint_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    reader_id INT,
    publication_id INT,
    complaint_text TEXT,
    complaint_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE Suggestions (
    suggestion_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    reader_id INT,
    publication_id INT,
    suggestion_text TEXT,
    suggestion_date TIMESTAMP
);
